::Astral::

Astral nods and walks toward the shuttle as it lands and the hatch 
opens, inviting them in. He keeps his scanners working while he 
walks. He didn't trust this bot (he didn't trust any bot right away), 
and he wasn't about to be surprised by him.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "dcoburn" <dcoburn@n...> wrote:
> ::Composer::
> 
>      Composer brushed away sand as some flew at him as the 
transportation
> thing came to them.  He was eager to go on, but looked at Astral 
with
> insisting eyes.
> 
>       "Please, go ahead, after all, you are of the higher authority 
between
> us," He said kindly.
